title: "Haunted Woods Online"
content:
# Haunted Woods Online

Welcome to Haunted Woods Online, your go-to destination for all things horror and supernatural. Our website is dedicated to providing you with the latest news, reviews, and insights into the world of horror entertainment.

Whether you're a fan of spine-chilling movies, bone-rattling books, or hair-raising TV shows, we've got you covered. Our team of experts scours the darkest corners of the internet to bring you the most terrifying content available.

But that's not all - we also offer a community forum where you can connect with other horror enthusiasts from around the world. Share your favorite stories, discuss the latest trends, and even get tips on how to survive a zombie apocalypse.

So come on in, grab a flashlight, and explore the haunted woods with us. Just be sure to watch your back... you never know what might be lurking in the shadows.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A dark and moody image of a moonlit forest for a horror or supernatural website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
